page.title: 09Craze Loman-NE. of Tiverton
page.content: In Craze Loman we interviewed some people. Years ago most people worked on farms in the area. A man,who was a retired farm worker,told us that they used to produce most of their own food on the farm. The rest was bought in Tiverton. Nowadays most of the people go into Tiverton to work. They also go there for shopping. Years ago they used to entertain themselves by having visitors, playing games, gardening and going for walks. Nowadays the older people do much the same thing. The things that have changed are that the old Mill House is now a place where soft toys are made. The Link Road has changed Craze Loman quite a lot because of its noise and disturbance. Some new cottages have been built along with a new bungalow.
